title: Horst Heese
text:
Horst Heese (born 31 December 1943) is a German former professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player and manager.
Heese had 149 <a href="Bundesliga">Bundesliga</a> appearances for <a href="Eintracht%20Frankfurt">Eintracht Frankfurt</a> and <a href="Hamburger%20SV">HSV</a>. After his retirement he managed Offenbach, Nürnberg and Frankfurt. After being sacked in 1993 in Frankfurt he moved back to <a href="Eupen">Eupen</a> in Belgium, where he still lives.
In 1988, he became the national coach of Malta until May 1991. After that, he coached in Cyprus and Singapore before returning to Malta for another four years as technical director and then as head coach.
